verses.verse: Then went <WH3212> <WH8799> SHimshon <WH8123> to Gaza <WH5804>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> there an harlot <WH802> <WH2181> <WH8802>, and went in <WH935> <WH8799> unto her.

And it was told the Gazites <WH5841>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, SHimshon <WH8123> is come <WH935> <WH8804> hither. And they compassed him in <WH5437> <WH8799>, and laid wait <WH693> <WH8799> for him all night <WH3915> in the gate <WH8179> of the city <WH5892>, and were quiet <WH2790> <WH8691> all the night <WH3915>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, In the morning <WH1242>, when it is day <WH216>, we shall kill <WH2026> <WH8804> him.

And SHimshon <WH8123> lay <WH7901> <WH8799> till midnight <WH2677> <WH3915>, and arose <WH6965> <WH8799> at midnight <WH2677> <WH3915>, and took <WH270> <WH8799> the doors <WH1817> of the gate <WH8179> of the city <WH5892>, and the two <WH8147> posts <WH4201>, and went away <WH5265> <WH8799> with them, bar <WH1280> and all, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> them upon his shoulders <WH3802>, and carried them up <WH5927> <WH8686> to the top <WH7218> of an hill <WH2022> that is before <WH6440> Hevron <WH2275>.
And it came to pass afterward <WH310>, that he loved <WH157> <WH8799> a woman <WH802> in the valley <WH5158> of Sorek <WH7796>, whose name <WH8034> was D'lilah <WH1807>.

And the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto her, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Entice <WH6601> <WH8761> him, and see <WH7200> <WH8798> wherein his great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth, and by what means we may prevail <WH3201> <WH8799> against him, that we may bind <WH631> <WH8804> him to afflict <WH6031> <WH8763> him: and we will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee every one <WH376> of us eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> pieces of silver <WH3701>.

And D'lilah <WH1807> said <WH559> <WH8799> to SHimshon <WH8123>, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, wherein thy great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth, and wherewith thou mightest be bound <WH631> <WH8735> to afflict <WH6031> <WH8763> thee.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, If they bind <WH631> <WH8799> me with seven <WH7651> green <WH3892> withs <WH3499> that were never dried <WH2717> <WH8795>, then shall I be weak <WH2470> <WH8804>, and be as another <WH259> man <WH120>.

Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> to her seven <WH7651> green <WH3892> withs <WH3499> which had not been dried <WH2717> <WH8795>, and she bound <WH631> <WH8799> him with them.

Now there were men lying in wait <WH693> <WH8802>, abiding <WH3427> <WH8802> with her in the chamber <WH2315>. And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon thee, SHimshon <WH8123>. And he brake <WH5423> <WH8762> the withs <WH3499>, as a thread <WH6616> of tow <WH5296> is broken <WH5423> <WH8735> when it toucheth <WH7306> <WH8687> the fire <WH784>. So his strength <WH3581> was not known <WH3045> <WH8738>.

And D'lilah <WH1807> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto SHimshon <WH8123>, Behold, thou hast mocked <WH2048> <WH8765> me, and told <WH1696> <WH8762> me lies <WH3577>: now tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be bound <WH631> <WH8735>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, If they bind <WH631> <WH8799> me fast <WH631> <WH8800> with new <WH2319> ropes <WH5688> that never were occupied <WH4399> <WH6213> <WH8738>, then shall I be weak <WH2470> <WH8804>, and be as another <WH259> man <WH120>.

D'lilah <WH1807> therefore took <WH3947> <WH8799> new <WH2319> ropes <WH5688>, and bound <WH631> <WH8799> him therewith, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon thee, SHimshon <WH8123>. And there were liers in wait <WH693> <WH8802> abiding <WH3427> <WH8802> in the chamber <WH2315>. And he brake <WH5423> <WH8762> them from off his arms <WH2220> like a thread <WH2339>.

And D'lilah <WH1807> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto SHimshon <WH8123>, Hitherto <WH2008> thou hast mocked <WH2048> <WH8765> me, and told <WH1696> <WH8762> me lies <WH3577>: tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me wherewith thou mightest be bound <WH631> <WH8735>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, If thou weavest <WH707> <WH8799> the seven <WH7651> locks <WH4253> of my head <WH7218> with the web <WH4545>.

And she fastened <WH8628> <WH8799> it with the pin <WH3489>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon thee, SHimshon <WH8123>. And he awaked <WH3364> <WH8799> out of his sleep <WH8142>, and went away <WH5265> <WH8799> with the pin <WH3489> of the beam <WH708>, and with the web <WH4545>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, How <WH349> canst thou say <WH559> <WH8799>, I love <WH157> <WH8804> thee, when thine heart <WH3820> is not with me? thou hast mocked <WH2048> <WH8765> me these three <WH7969> times <WH6471>, and hast not told <WH5046> <WH8689> me wherein thy great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth.

And it came to pass, when she pressed <WH6693> <WH8689> him daily <WH3117> with her words <WH1697>, and urged <WH509> <WH8762> him, so that his soul <WH5315> was vexed <WH7114> <WH8799> unto death <WH4191> <WH8800>;

That he told <WH5046> <WH8686> her all his heart <WH3820>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, There hath not come <WH5927> <WH8804> a razor <WH4177> upon mine head <WH7218>; for I have been a Nazarite <WH5139> unto 'Elohim <WH430> from my mother's <WH517> womb <WH990>: if I be shaven <WH1548> <WH8795>, then my strength <WH3581> will go <WH5493> <WH8804> from me, and I shall become weak <WH2470> <WH8804>, and be like any other man <WH120>.

And when D'lilah <WH1807> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that he had told <WH5046> <WH8689> her all his heart <WH3820>, she sent <WH7971> <WH8799> and called <WH7121> <WH8799> for the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> this once <WH6471>, for he hath shewed <WH5046> <WH8689> me all his heart <WH3820>. Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> <WH8804> unto her, and brought <WH5927> <WH8686> money <WH3701> in their hand <WH3027>.

And she made him sleep <WH3462> <WH8762> upon her knees <WH1290>; and she called <WH7121> <WH8799> for a man <WH376>, and she caused him to shave off <WH1548> <WH8762> the seven <WH7651> locks <WH4253> of his head <WH7218>; and she began <WH2490> <WH8686> to afflict <WH6031> <WH8763> him, and his strength <WH3581> went <WH5493> <WH8799> from him.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon thee, SHimshon <WH8123>. And he awoke <WH3364> <WH8799> out of his sleep <WH8142>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will go out <WH3318> <WH8799> as at other times before <WH6471>, and shake <WH5287> <WH8735> myself. And he wist <WH3045> <WH8804> not that the YY <WH3068> was departed <WH5493> <WH8804> from him.

But the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH270> <WH8799> him, and put out <WH5365> <WH8762> his eyes <WH5869>, and brought him down <WH3381> <WH8686> to Gaza <WH5804>, and bound <WH631> <WH8799> him with fetters of brass <WH5178>; and he did grind <WH2912> <WH8802> in the prison <WH631> <WH8803> house <WH1004>.
Howbeit the hair <WH8181> of his head <WH7218> began <WH2490> <WH8686> to grow again <WH6779> <WH8763> after <WH834> he was shaven <WH1548> <WH8795>.

Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> gathered them together <WH622> <WH8738> for to offer <WH2076> <WH8800> a great <WH1419> sacrifice <WH2077> unto Dagon <WH1712> their god <WH430>, and to rejoice <WH8057>: for they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Our god <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> SHimshon <WH8123> our enemy <WH341> <WH8802> into our hand <WH3027>.

And when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> him, they praised <WH1984> <WH8762> their god <WH430>: for they said <WH559> <WH8804>, Our god <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> into our hands <WH3027> our enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, and the destroyer <WH2717> <WH8688> of our country <WH776>, which slew <WH2491> many <WH7235> <WH8689> of us.

And it came to pass, when their hearts <WH3820> were merry <WH2896>, that they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Call <WH7121> <WH8798> for SHimshon <WH8123>, that he may make us sport <WH7832> <WH8762>. And they called <WH7121> <WH8799> for SHimshon <WH8123> out of the prison <WH631> <WH8803> house <WH1004>; and he made them <WH6440> sport <WH6711> <WH8762>: and they set <WH5975> <WH8686> him between the pillars <WH5982>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the lad <WH5288> that held <WH2388> <WH8688> him by the hand <WH3027>, Suffer <WH3240> <WH8685> me that I may feel <WH4184> <WH8685> <WH8675> <WH3237> <WH8685> the pillars <WH5982> whereupon the house <WH1004> standeth <WH3559> <WH8737>, that I may lean <WH8172> <WH8735> upon them.

Now the house <WH1004> was full <WH4390> <WH8804> of men <WH582> and women <WH802>; and all the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> were there; and there were upon the roof <WH1406> about three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> and women <WH802>, that beheld <WH7200> <WH8802> while SHimshon <WH8123> made sport <WH7832> <WH8800>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, remember <WH2142> <WH8798> me, I pray thee, and strengthen <WH2388> <WH8761> me, I pray thee, only this once <WH6471>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, that I may be at once <WH259> avenged <WH5358> <WH8735> <WH5359> of the Philistines <WH6430> for my two <WH8147> eyes <WH5869>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> took hold <WH3943> <WH8799> of the two <WH8147> middle <WH8432> pillars <WH5982> upon which the house <WH1004> stood <WH3559> <WH8737>, and on which it was borne up <WH5564> <WH8735>, of the one <WH259> with his right hand <WH3225>, and of the other <WH259> with his left <WH8040>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me die <WH4191> <WH8799> <WH5315> with the Philistines <WH6430>. And he bowed <WH5186> <WH8799> himself with all his might <WH3581>; and the house <WH1004> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the lords <WH5633>, and upon all the people <WH5971> that were therein. So the dead <WH4191> <WH8801> which he slew <WH4191> <WH8689> at his death <WH4194> were more <WH7227> than they which he slew <WH4191> <WH8689> in his life <WH2416>.

Then his brethren <WH251> and all the house <WH1004> of his father <WH1> came down <WH3381> <WH8799>, and took <WH5375> <WH8799> him, and brought him up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him between Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847> in the buryingplace <WH6913> of Manoach <WH4495> his father <WH1>. And he judged <WH8199> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>.
